page.title: 17HOUSING IN ST.WENN AREA
page.content: { Cottages}are something like a bungalow but they are older than a bungalow because bungalows are very new.Many of our homes are cottages.{ { Cottages}are sometimes big and sometimes small.If the cottages are big,I think they have got three or four bedrooms up_stairs and the rest down_stairs.If the cottages are small they have two or three rooms upstairs. { Cottages}are old and are rough on the out_side.The walls are often made of cob and are white-washed. { Council houses} are sometimes detatched and sometimes semi-detatched {Council houses}have got three windows and a door in the front. At the back but they have got five windows and a door.}Most have got numbers on their front doors.Thre are twelve council houses in our area.
